# Pete Franklin

 

[Mayor and Town Council](https://townofsteilacoom.org/Directory.aspx?DID=4)  
Title: Council Member  
Phone: 253-584-0808  
[Email](mailto:pete.franklin@ci.steilacoom.wa.us)

January 2022 – December 2025
